entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
